ModMetaData.name: [1001]Filter by Headlesss
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a filter allowing you to filter corpses by those that have had their head removed, allowing automation at the crematorium again.
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at:
\n\nVersion 1.0.0 \nFor version 1.3.
